text: Music Box is the third album by American singer and songwriter Mariah Carey. It was released on August 31, 1993. It is a mixture of pop, pop-soul and R&B; ballads. The album was certified diamond, becoming Carey's first album to do so. ==Track listing== International edition Latin American edition ==Charts and certifications== ===Charts=== Chart Peak position
